item.description:
Come join us at Amherst Dog Wash for Yappy Hour on Thursday March 14, 2013 from 5:30-7:00 p.m. Enjoy refreshments while meeting other local dog owners, get 20% off toys, treats and leashes (consignment not included), and don’t forget to grab a complimentary goodie bag full of great stuff for your canine companion. This event is FREE, but please sign up through the Meetup group. Questions can be directed to amherstdogwash@gmail.com. Space is limited. Dogs comfortable with crowds and other dogs are welcome.

413-253-WASH (9274)

http://www.amherstdogwash.com/
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Amherst-Dog-Wash/287663504634333

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Yappy Hours - Amherst Dog Wash
